message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the impact it could have on your projects, I propose a price of $11000 for the product. This offer takes into account both the product's worth and the opportunity cost for you, estimated at $12000. I am confident this price will be mutually beneficial and allow us to move forward with a successful transaction. Please let me know if you need any further information or clarification about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.
